network.client

Class ClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • network.client.ClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientConnection
extends java.lang.Thread
    Represents a thread on the client-side which handles the communication with a server.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    Server

        public ClientConnection(java.lang.String hostName,
                        int port,
                        User user,
                        MenuController menuController)
        Creates a new ClientConnection trying to connect to a server.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the host name of the server.
        port - the port of the server.
        user - the User connected to this client.
        menuController - the controller responsible for starting this client.
